name: Firework Artisan Tama
skill: Deals 3532/4352 DMG to the enemy with the most HP.
bond: Firework Artisan Kagi > Firework Artisan Tama
Increases Firework Artisan Tama's skill DMG by 10%
Firework Artisan Tama > Firework Artisan Kagi
Increases Firework Artisan Kagi's skill DMG by 10%

additional_data.description: One of the two master firework artisans that captured the imaginations of the people in Edo-era Japan. Originally working under Firework Artisan Kagi, Tama quickly proved herself by learning all her master had to teach before setting up shop of her own, becoming her old master's friend and greatest rival. Putting her genius to good use, Tama is known for inventive, original creations, though some say they don't meet with the approval of firework traditionalists.
additional_data.how_to_acquire:
◦ "The Great Fireworks Showdown" Event: Defeat Lv. 60, 70, 140, 180 Avatar Shiranui.
◦ "The Great Fireworks Showdown" Event: Random drops after LVL 60.
◦ "The Great Fireworks Showdown" Get a Second Half Ranking of 1000 and above.
◦ "The Great Fireworks Showdown" Get a Second Half Ranking of 2501~6000.
◦ "The Great Fireworks Showdown" Get a Total Ranking of 7500 and above.
additional_data.notes_and_trivia: ◦ Slightly increases total Event Points gained during the "The Great Fireworks Showdown" event.

main: "Impressive right? It's my finest work yet!"
summon: "My creations are things of beauty, eh?"
limit_break: "Someday even the naysayers will accept my genius!"
